encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: Add <unclear></unclear> to initial hypsilon of b.6; add *high-punctus* after first eta in b.7 (confirmed on image); in b.10 print εἰσανιὼν; in b.17 add *high-punctus* after nu; in b.18 add *high-punctus* after sigma; add [.?].4[.?] as first line of fr.1 and renumber; replace : with · in fr.1.2 and 2.2; add number tags in fr.1.5; in fr. 1.6 print Γύγης; dot the mu in fr. 2.5. META: remove volume numbers from biblio items; add image link (http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4----ded--0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-4653--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASH0138a5c0437ee3d3b349ef1d); passage metadata can be encoded too (ll. 143-149, 411-420, 681-694, 751-771); Hesiod is CWKB 917 and Theogony is 2707; mp3 is 00500.300; Oxyrhynchus and Oxyrhynchites are https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983 and https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736982, respectively; fr. 2 measures 2 x 6.5 cm; date is early third according to both editions

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: Add <unclear></unclear> to initial hypsilon of b.6; add *high-punctus* after first eta in b.7 (confirmed on image); in b.10 print εἰσανιὼν; in b.17 add *high-punctus* after nu; in b.18 add *high-punctus* after sigma; add [.?].4[.?] as first line of fr.1 and renumber; replace : with · in fr.1.2 and 2.2; add number tags in fr.1.5; in fr. 1.6 print Γύγης; dot the mu in fr. 2.5. META: remove volume numbers from biblio items; add image link (http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4----ded--0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-4653--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASH0138a5c0437ee3d3b349ef1d); passage metadata can be encoded too (ll. 143-149, 411-420, 681-694, 751-771); Hesiod is CWKB 917 and Theogony is 2707; mp3 is 00500.300; Oxyrhynchus and Oxyrhynchites are https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983 and https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736982, respectively; fr. 2 measures 2 x 6.5 cm; date is early third according to both editions
Submit - Unfortunately Leiden+ still does not allow ancient diacriticals after unclear characters. If you want to revise the Leiden+ text, please remove <unclear></unclear> in line 8 of fragment 2.
Submit - Unfortunately Leiden+ still does not allow ancient diacriticals after unclear characters. If you want to revise the Leiden+ text, please remove <unclear></unclear> in line 8 of fragment 2.
